column4: guys i cant make the stand by mode to work on ubuntu 8.04 for my nobo. I mean, once I logoff and close my notebook and open it again there is no image. for some reason the display will not work, even if a press the nobo's Fn buttons to make it wakeup. any suggestions?
suspend/hibernate is still broken for alot of people
gutsy and hardy are having those problems.  i heard it worked great befor gutsy
